gw.api.domain.invoice

Class ChargeInstallmentChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.ChargeInstallmentChanger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover, ChargeEntryContainer

    public class ChargeInstallmentChanger
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChargeEntryContainer, com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover
    The sole authority on changing Invoice Items that are on "initialized" charges (charges whose BillingInstruction has been executed.)

    Allows for the change, addition, or removal of InvoiceItems. Operations are not committed until the execute() method is called.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry
      Encapsulates the data required to add, remove, or modify an InvoiceItem when execute() is called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChargeInstallmentChanger

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger(Charge charge)
        Constructs a Charge Installment Changer instance on the given charge.

        Note: The operations will be done in the charge's bundle.

        Parameters:
        charge - Charge whose installments we'll be modifying.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in Charge does not have a billing instruction, that billing instruction is not yet executed, or if the bundle for the Charge is read-only. (Charges must be writeable to be changed.)

      • ChargeInstallmentChanger

        protected ChargeInstallmentChanger(Charge charge,

        Special constructor only for use by PaymentPlanChanger
        Parameters:
        charge - Charge which is being refactored
        newPaymentPlan - The new payment plan for the refactor
        redistributePayments - Whether payments are to be redistributed after refactor

      • addEntry

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry addEntry(@Nonnull
                                      MonetaryAmount amount,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      InvoiceItemType type,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.util.Date eventDate)
        Plan to create a new InvoiceItem with the given amount, type, and date. The InvoiceItem will not be immediately created, but will instead be created when execute() is called.
        Parameters:
        amount - The Amount value for the new InvoiceItem.
        type - The InvoiceItemType of the new InvoiceItem.
        eventDate - The EventDate for the new InvoiceItem.
        Returns:
        An Entry encapsulating the fields for the InvoiceItem that will be created upon execute().
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this ChargeInstallmentChanger has already been executed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed type is either InvoiceItemType.TC_COMMISSIONREMAINDER or InvoiceItemType.TC_COMMISSIONADJUSTMENT, or if the currency of the amount is different than the currency of the charge.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the amount, type or eventDate are null

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Executes all planned changes, adds, and removals entered into the changer for this charge.

        This method will also perform various other tasks that must be done for the system to remain consistent:

        • ItemEvents: Creates ItemEvents for added or edited InvoiceItems
        • Write-offs: Reverses any write-offs for removed InvoiceItems or InvoiceItems with reduced Amounts
        • PaymentItems: Reverses and redistributes all PaymentItems if any items were added or removed or any InvoiceItems had their Amounts changed
        • Commission: Removes any overridden commission rate overrides for modified InvoiceItems and redistributes commission for the entire Charge if any items were added or removed or any InvoiceItems had their Amounts changed
        • Denorms: Updates Invoice.Amount and Invoice.AmountDue
        • Plugins: Calls IInvoiceItem.updateExceptionInfo(gw.pl.currency.MonetaryAmount, gw.bc.invoice.entity.InvoiceItem, InvoiceItemExceptionContext) for modified InvoiceItems

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any InvoiceItem on the Charge has been modified since this class was initialized, any of the edits or removes are on billed Invoices, or the Charge's new total is not the same as its old total, or if the ChargeInstallmentChanger has already been executed.

      • getInvoicesForRemoval

        public java.util.Set<Invoice> getInvoicesForRemoval()
        Specified by:
        getInvoicesForRemoval in interface com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover

      • getInvoiceStreamForRemoval

        public InvoiceStream getInvoiceStreamForRemoval()

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Cleans up the temporary unused invoices that this changer is responsible for. Should be called when a ChargeInstallmentChanger is not going to be executed.

      • getEntryFor

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry getEntryFor(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the entry for the given invoice item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given invoiceItem is not currently on this changer's charge
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the changer has already been executed.

      • newEntry

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry newEntry()
        Asks the changer to create a new invoice item in its execute() method.

        This method returns an entry which can be used to modify the plans for the newly created InvoiceItem.

        Returns:
        the Entry that was created with default values
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this changer has already been executed
